summary: Completed comprehensive testing of Elite Contact Us flow. All 14 backend API tests passed (100%). Frontend UI flow tested successfully with Playwright - modal opens, form fields work, submission succeeds with success message displayed.
passed_tests: POST /api/elite/contact successful submission with all fields
POST /api/elite/contact works with minimal data (message only)
GET /api/elite/inquiries returns inquiries list and stats
Elite inquiry document has correct structure (id, creator_id, creator_email, creator_name, message, status, created_at)
Inquiry persisted and retrievable after creation
Frontend: Elite Contact Us button opens modal
Frontend: Modal has Company Name, Team Size, Message fields
Frontend: Submit button sends inquiry to backend
Frontend: Success message shown after submission
seed_data_creation: Multiple test inquiries created during testing (prefixed with TEST_ or PLAYWRIGHT_TEST)

frontend_modal.trigger: Contact Us button on Elite plan card
frontend_modal.success_message: Thank You! We've received your inquiry and will be in touch within 24 hours.

mocked_apis_list: SendGrid email delivery - returns false gracefully when SENDGRID_API_KEY not configured
mocked_apis.note: Email sending is MOCKED - sales_email_sent and confirmation_email_sent return false since SendGrid API key is not set

context_for_next_testing_agent: Elite Contact Us flow fully implemented and tested. Backend stores inquiries in elite_inquiries collection with status tracking (pending, contacted, converted, declined). Frontend modal opens from Elite plan card, has Company Name, Team Size, Message fields. Emails are configured but SendGrid API key not set (email_sent will be false). Test file: /app/tests/test_elite_contact.py. All 14 backend tests pass. Frontend Playwright test confirms full flow works.
